text:
Located ultra close to the MRT, the hostel is great for people on budgets. The inside would need a bit of cleaning up, with the toilet looking dirty (I didn't even dare to step inside) and random stuff like boxes and pillows being packed all around. However, the owner is professional when I check in and out. Prepare some cash to pay a deposit for the key.

Pro:
Location
Cheap

Con:
Needs a bit of clean up
Stairs

It saved me when i had my short travel to Singapore last June. Went there with my mom and two aunts, late knowing that they haven't book any room. I was freak out. Thank God i found this place with very nice price. The owner/manager is so nice, helped me order Grabs. Hihi.
I stayed there 3 nights and it was pretty good although the rooms are very small and need wardrobes
Good for you that concern about budget. Clean room. Fast wifi. Near by the mrt station. Old and dirty building in the outside.
Good for a short stay on a budget. Don't bring too much luggage as there is no lift.
